attributes.comment:
I just wanted to share my feelings regarding the increase in the I-600A fee. We
needed to fill this form out for our upcoming adoption through China. We have
already paid the $545, and have recently found out that our wait time before we go
to China to pick up our baby has been extended to another 18 months. We
started the adoption process in March of 2006. So we will have to re-file the I 171-
H, which also means the I-600A form, because it expires after 18 months, and this
has to be current before traveling to China. It is hard enough that we will have to re-
file this form and pay the amount again, but now with the expense possibly going
up to $670, this is going to be a huge heartache for us. We are unable to have
kids of our own, and would not be able to afford the adoption itself without the help
we've gotten from family. We cannot afford another extra expense. Please
reconsider raising this fee, at least reconsider raising the fee by the amount that
was being negotiated. I really appreciate your time. Thank you.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Sharene N. Kammerer, CCAI (Chinese Children Adoption International)
